other_tests.findings: The diagnosis of glioblastoma multiforme (World Health Organization grade IV) was confirmed on histologic examination.
Normal pattern of expression of MLH1, MSH2, and MSH6; complete absence of PMS2 in both tumor and normal tissue.
Identified a missense mutation c.137Gâ†’T (p.Ser46Ile) in the PMS2 gene.
Detected complete deletion of exon 10 in the PMS2 gene.
Revealed more than 30 polyps, with 1 large polyp suggestive of cancer.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Histopathological analysis showed adenomatous polyps with low-grade dysplasia and one polyp with intramucosal adenocarcinoma.

other_tests.findings: Histopathological analysis showed adenomatous polyps with low-grade dysplasia; one polyp had intramucosal adenocarcinoma.
